entry.title: Once Upon A Robin
entry.summary:
Author: Fangirl_who_died

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,882Chapters: 14/17Kudos: 101

Summary: Damian's in love. And doesn't regret it in the slightest. But there was one problem. She lived in France, And he lived in Gotham. For superhero business, of course.But apparently, that didn't matter to her as she quite literally said, "Time to meet the parents, logistics be damned."OrMarinette Dupain-Cheng meets her beloved's chaotic siblings. Through a chatfic.[For snowraven24680. Consider it as a fan's gift. I read your fanfiction very frequently, even tho its not daminette.
